title: Cosmological Theories From $SO(2,2)/SO(2)\times SO(1,1)$
abstract: We herein set forth intrinsically four-dimensional string solutions and analyze some of its properties. The solutions are constructed as gauged WZW models of the coset $SO(2,2)/SO(2)\times SO(1,1)$. We recover backgrounds having metric and antisymmetric tensors, dilaton fields and two electromagnetic fields. The theories describe anisotropically expanding and static universes for some time values.
